About us

We are food writers, outdoorspeople, musicians, lawyers, techies, experts and amateurs. And winemakers, all.

A FEW OF OUR MEMBERS

James Smith

Born in upstate NY, Carlos grew up in Ecuador then moved back to the US after high school. After an initial career in investment banking he worked with a variety of start-up ventures in various industries all over the world. He is currently at a DC-based boutique investment bank that he co-founded 20 years ago, while enjoying life in Reston, VA with his wife and 2 daughters.
